# Stencil.js Pin Code Panel

This is a web component I built for a simple framework agnostic numeric pin component with a software keyboard.

The purpose was originally to learn Stencil.js. 

## Getting Started

To run this demo, clone the repo and run

and run:

```bash
npm install
npm start
```

To build the component for production, run:

```bash
npm run build
```

## Using this component

Please refer to my tutorial, [Building my first Stencil.js component](https://medium.com/@john.kelaita/building-my-first-stencil-js-component-9eb02124c7bc) for details on how to use this component.
